article_title: Obamacare Declares Full Time is 30-hours; Simpson joins House Colleagues to Preserve 40 Hour Work Week
article_text: You are the owner of this article.

article_metadata.author: Journal Staff

og.description: WASHINGTON D.C — Idaho Congressman Mike Simpson voted in support of legislation Thursday to eliminate the language in Obamacare defining a full-time worker as someone who works more than 30-hours
